Honey (joinhoney.com) | Los Angeles | Full time | ONSITE

Founded in 2012 and based in Downtown, Los Angeles, Honey is the easiest way to save when shopping online! We currently have a coupon applying browser extension (available on Google Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge), a cash back program called Honey Gold, a price-watching tool called Droplist, and are working on several more features and products

We are a transparent, diverse, and collaborative team that's all working towards one common goal, to create abundance for everyone. We aspire to up-level ourselves and our team every day.

We are hiring for:

- Backend developers

- Frontend developers

- DevOps engineers

- Data engineers

- Data scientists

- QA engineers

- Plus a whole load of non-technical positions

Job descriptions and applications: http://grnh.se/t7lb1w1
